2005-08-17

Kristin Hersh - Borderline, London - 3rd July 1992

I've just started seeding on Dimeadozen/Easytree the Kristin Hersh show I mentioned a couple of days back. Go here for details (you'll need to register if you aren't already a member). Pretty good recording of a pretty good show (though I say so myself).
